WOW!  Star Control vibes here for sure!

So, I've owned SPAZ 1&2 for a couple few years now and while i've played a ton of SPAZ 2, I just finally decided to give SPAZ 1 a go!

I really dig SPAZ 2 and had read a few reviews of people melting down that 2 wasn't the same as 1 (Snappy) and had thought they were off their rockers because 2 is a fun and engaging game.

While i still wholeheartedly disagree with that particular reviewer, I do agree that 1 is a fantastic game on it's own legs!  It IS quite different, (for example you get different complete ships instead of block building, and you can change out engine/reactor/weapons etc like a more traditional space opera type game) but it is just a different but ALSO very good game that follows the same storyline and universe.

Really fun if you dig these types of games at all, absolutely give them a go!  Read up on the devs a little also, pretty cool 2 man team putting out stellar games.

If you guys happen to read this I have to say, I would DEFINITELY buy a 3.  I would buy expansions for both 1 and 2 also! 

Feels like a mash up of the highlights from the two games would make an incredible foundation for a really epic adventure.  I'm looking forward to playing what they release in the future.
